name: Silent City
description:
C, a Half-Blood Demon Hunter, struggles to find her identity as she tracks down a dangerous Demon outlaw.

Kill any NPC you if you want, or control them with magic. The fate of Human and Demon is in your hands.

The game takes about 5 minutes to complete.

Controls:

The game requires both keyboard and mouse to play.

Press Directional Keys or WASD keys to move your character or menu cursor.

Press Enter or Space Bar to confirm selections.

Press Esc to cancel or open the Main Menu.

Press F5 to reset the game, and F4 to toggle Full Screen.

When you get close to a NPC, interaction buttons appear. 

Click on "Talk" with your mouse to talk to the NPC. 

Click on "Shoot" to attack them. 

Click on "Control" to control the NPC with C's magic power. 

If your HP reaches 0, the game will end.

Engines and Plugins:

This game is made with RPG Maker MV.
